name: OffDimension [Jam Version]
description:
Needs a controller (it might work only with ps4 controller, not sure, could not try :P )

R2 = Fire

Click Left Thumbstick = Boost

L1+R1 = Switch dimension!

Triangle (Y I guess) = Switch weapons

Goal is just to score as much point as possible. Your two weapons only reload when you are in the associated world (fire or ice).

This was made by: Philippe Grenon and Félix-Antoine Goulet

Music by Zodik https://opengameart.org/content/zodik-timeq
